name: Ninja Usagimaru: Two Tails of Adventure
summary:
The game bundle is being released digitally in Japan for PlayStation Vita but has an English language option included. 
 
"Ninja Usagimaru: Two Tails of Adventure" is a set containing "Ninja Usagimaru: The Gem of Blessings" and "Ninja Usagimaru: The Mysterious Karakuri Castle" on PSVita. 
 
It's an action puzzle game where the player controls the main character, Usagimaru, in order to rescue the captured villagers from various gimmicks using the rocks and items.
storyline:
"It's an amazing story no one knows "when" or "where" it happened. 
There was a young man who traveled to many places with the winds and his moods. 
His name was "Usagimaru". 
One time, Usagimaru stopped by a village in his travel, and the story started."
